title: Emotes wheel don't work [HELP]
body:
When i go in collection and emotes,jump me this:
https://imgur.com/a/jkgJy

Can anyone help me?

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

I recommend a full wipe and reinstall of LoL every few months, it helps a lot.

The patching tool is a cancer that will eat up every bit of space on your HD, and negatively effect your gaming experience.

Last time I reinstalled, I cleared 2-3 gigs of space that was redundant trash from LoL, old files that don't get used and slow you down.
